715629f-a.text:
West 140th Street, east from Riverside Drive to Broadway (atop of hill), showing W.P.A. employees recovering street bed. Partially shown on the extreme left is the Academy of the Holy Child whileSt. Regis Convent is on the right. The latter consists of stone and frame buildings bearing No.
628.
May 5, 1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Art Project.

715628f-a.text:
a4272825 Vest 14Oth Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of
Riverside Drive.
September 24, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

722803f-a.text:
The Academy of the Holy Child, Riverside Drive at the N.E. corner
of 140th Street.
September 24, 1931.
